medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient noticed a drop in visual acuity in both eyes as pregnancy progressed, particularly during her second pregnancy in early 2019. Her progressive condition has been ongoing for 6 months, with a history of a known autosomal dominant condition with secondary glaucoma since 2018.
medical_history.past_medical_history: A known case of an unspecified autosomal dominant condition with secondary glaucoma, diagnosed in 2018. Past medical history includes gestational diabetes mellitus.
medical_history.family_history: Family history includes an unspecified autosomal dominant condition. Her newborn son is affected by the same condition without features of glaucoma; her 5-year-old daughter does not have this condition.
